targets.expr: sum by (name, port_id) (meraki_ms_port_traffic_bytes{serial=~"$switch", org_id=~"$organization", network_id=~"$network", direction=~"rx|tx"})

sum by (name, port_id) (meraki_ms_port_packets_rate_crcerrors{serial=~"$switch", org_id=~"$organization", network_id=~"$network", direction="total"} + meraki_ms_port_packets_rate_fragments{serial=~"$switch", org_id=~"$organization", network_id=~"$network", direction="total"} + meraki_ms_port_packets_rate_collisions{serial=~"$switch", org_id=~"$organization", network_id=~"$network", direction="total"} + meraki_ms_port_packets_rate_topologychanges{serial=~"$switch", org_id=~"$organization", network_id=~"$network", direction="total"})
